name: 0xResearch
title: Utf8b8jrqokajekalu4j1rydw1w Takes Over Solana
text:
Synopsis
The launch of Trump-branded memecoins on Solana triggered massive crypto market activity, with unprecedented token valuations and network stress, highlighting the volatile and speculative nature of cryptocurrency markets.

Key Insights
- TRUMP memecoin launched with an 80% insider allocation, reaching a $14 billion market cap within 33 hours
- MELANIA memecoin followed, quickly achieving a $13 billion market cap
- Solana network experienced significant stress:
  - Daily DEX volumes increased from $6 million to $39 million
  - Real Economic Value (REV) spiked to $57 million
  - Jito's block engine temporarily disrupted
  - Phantom wallet reported transaction and loading issues
- Jupiter exchange and other platforms experienced API and transaction disruptions
- Solana's price reached a new all-time high of $292
- Concerns raised about token liquidity concentration and potential market manipulation
- Crypto infrastructure demonstrated both resilience and vulnerability during high-volume trading
